definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: The old lady fusses over her little dog as if it were a sick child.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人照顧她的小狗，猶如照顧她生病的孩子。

sentences.english: The old woman a maid servant to clean her house.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人僱傭了一個暖和的僕人去洗她的馬。

sentences.english: The old lady has practised a lot at drawing and she is now a famous painter.
sentences.chinese: 這位老婦人刻苦練習繪畫，她現在是一名著名畫家了。

sentences.english: The old woman, hearing Clemencia's voice, went back to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人，聽克萊門的聲音，回去睡覺。

sentences.english: The old woman slumped in the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 那個老婦人團坐在沙發上。

sentences.english: The old woman sighed out her grief.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人嘆着氣敘說她的悲哀。

sentences.english: An afebrile elderly woman who suffered from left flank pain for 1 month visited the emergency department for help.
sentences.chinese: 一位體溫正常老婦人因左腰痛一個月到急診部門求醫。

sentences.english: The old woman has been worn away by her recent illness.
sentences.chinese: 由於最近生病，老婦人的身體日趨衰弱。

sentences.english: That old woman takes every care to just rush those geese on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 那位老婦人盡全力才把那些鵝趕下湖。

sentences.english: At that time, an old lady dug in the ground of the field and picked the roots of the dandelions.
sentences.chinese: 這時，有位老婦人在田野上挖地，撿起蒲公英的根。

sentences.english: The rich landlord cheated the poor old woman of her land.
sentences.chinese: 富裕的地主從那位貧窮的老婦人那裏騙走了土地。

sentences.english: The old woman had fallen asleep in one of the handicapped seats at the front.
sentences.chinese: 這位老婦人在殘疾人專座上已經睡着了。

sentences.english: Please work this old woman in between other appointments.
sentences.chinese: 請把這位老婦人安排在其他預約病人中間。

sentences.english: Seeing this, the old woman was like a person waking from a dream.
sentences.chinese: 此情此景，讓老婦人如夢初醒。

sentences.english: A fifty-six-year-old woman accused of spreading rumors.
sentences.chinese: 一位五十六歲的老婦人，罪名是散佈謠言。

sentences.english: The old woman prefers to write her letters rather than dictate others.
sentences.chinese: 這位老婦人寧願自己寫信，而不願口授給人筆錄。

definition: to find/to track down/to recover (sth lost)
Gukeng or Kukeng township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
to visit (a patient, prisoner etc)/to look inquiringly
unable to move freely/difficult to get about
